## 🌊 About Me

Hello! My name is **Milagros Guadalupe Rivera**, and I am a PhD student at the **University of California, Santa Cruz**.

I specialize in **marine mammal conservation** using **emerging genomic tools**. More broadly, I am passionate about **population genomics** and its applications for **the conservation and management of long-lived mammals**.

I love **diving into genomic mysteries**, working on **data visualization**, and finding new ways to **use bioinformatics for conservation**. When I'm not at my computer, you can find me **exploring tide pools, making art, or enjoying a good cup of coffee ☕🌿**
